briefTitle: The Significance of Radiologically Detected Intramammary Lymph Nodes in Prediction of Axillary Lymph Nodes Status in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: The Significance of Radiologically Detected Intramammary Lymph Nodes in Prediction of Axillary Lymph Nodes Status in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: prediction of axillary lymph nodes status
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patients aged more than 18 years old presented with breast cancer with radiologically detected intramammary lymph nodes and agreed to participate in the study

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy.
* Psychological instability.
* Patients who refused to participate in our study.
* Patients whose age less than 18 years old.
